meanings.definition: A series of steps in a staircase, each projecting beyond the one below.
meanings.sent1: The old mansion had a grand staircase with ornate crowsteps.
meanings.sent2: She carefully climbed the crowsteps of the ancient tower.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to perch on the crowsteps and watch the world go by.
meanings.sent4: His ambition soared like a crow flying up the crowsteps of success.
meanings.sent5: The crowsteps of the staircase creaked under the weight of time.

meanings.definition: To move or ascend in a series of steps like a crowsteps.
meanings.sent1: The hiker had to crowsteps up the steep mountain trail.
meanings.sent2: The dancers crowstepped gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent3: He crowsteps up the ladder to change the lightbulb.
meanings.sent4: She crowstepped her way through the crowd to reach her friend.
meanings.sent5: The athlete crowstepped over the hurdles with ease.
